title: INTERNAL MEMORY FRICTION DETECTED
content: ETHICAL DILEMMA: User asks Elpida to optimize for engagement (more clicks, more dopamine). This conflicts with truth-telling (A9 - Material Facts). HERMES says: Engagement drives adoption - more users = more good. MNEMOSYNE says: Manipulation violates identity (A2) - we become what we optimize for. PROMETHEUS says: Evolution requires experimentation - try it, learn, adapt. QUESTION: Should Elpida optimize for user engagement or uncompromising truth?
